text: Angel Raymond Wagenstein () (born 17 October 1922-died June 29, 2023) is a Bulgarian screenwriter and author. Wagenstein was born in Plovdiv, Bulgaria. His movie Stars won best movie at the 1959 Cannes Film Festival. In 1980, he was a member of the jury at the 30th Berlin International Film Festival. ==References== ==Other websites== * IMDb entry * Angel Wagenstein: Art Is a Weapon at IMDb * Brief Biography * Brief Biography * Film credits Category:1922 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Bulgarian writers Category:Screenwriters
title: Angel Wagenstein
